snippet.title: The Land Beneath Us - Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Land Beneath Us is a turn-based, rogue-like, action, dungeon crawler. Players take the role of an AI that takes control of a robot and battles their way down to the lowest levels of the underworld to rescue their creator. The deeper the AI travels, the more it starts to understand the meaning of life.

Official website: 
https://fairplaystudios.net/landbeneathus/
Twitter:
https://twitter.com/fairplay_games
Like FairPlay Studios on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/fairplaystudios
